title: Water conservation & Soil Fertility - Farm Innovator Subhash Sharma 11

tasks.task: Building and maintaining soil fertility and water management systems on agricultural land.
subtasks: Creating planting beds using a grid system.
Preparing the soil for crop planting by adding organic matter and nutrients.
Managing water resources by optimizing irrigation and drainage.
Implementing green manure and mulching techniques to enhance soil fertility.
Applying water soaking and retention methods to improve soil moisture management.
Using organic inputs, such as mulch and green manure, to nourish the soil.
Monitoring and adjusting soil fertility and water levels regularly.
